Package org.zssn.escaperoom

package org.zssn.escaperoom
  • Class
    Description
    Character
    Class to create a character with name and gender
    ClueItem
    Item class for all the clues items in the game Each item has a clue necessary for completing the game Clue objects can't be picked up like notes
    CustomOutputStream
    Custom output stream to redirect the output to the JTextPane
    Direction
    Enum for all the accepted directions
    Enemy
    Enemy class.
    Game
    Game class.
    GameFrame
    GameFrame class.
    Gender
    Enum for all the accepted gender types
    HealingItem
    HealingItem class is a subclass of Item class.
    HiderItem
    Item class for all the hider items in the game An hider item hides another item in the room
    HidingItem
    HidingItem class is a subclass of Item class.
    Item
    Class Item - Represents an item in the game.
    ItemContainer
    ItemContainer class that contains other items used in the game The items in the container can be removed, but can't be added back
    Key
    Key class is a subclass of Item.
    LockType
    Enum for the three different types of lock for an item container
    Main
    The Main class is the entry point of the application.
    Map
    Map class that contains the rooms and the walls of the rooms
    Note
    Notes class that extends Item.
    Player
    Class to manage the Player properties.
    Room
    Room class is used to create the rooms of the game.
    Wall
    Class Wall - Represents a wall in the game.
